name: Michelle Rotella
bio: I graduated from General Assembly's Software Engineering program in 2023. Prior to General Assembly, I discovered I enjoyed programming during the pandemic, and enrolled in a prep course with Hackbright Academy. I have extensive professional experience in education, edTech, and consulting. I enjoy tackling complex problems to make doing hard work easier. Currently I am is working on a project to deepen my understanding and skill with Typescript. Outside of work I love a great novel, preparing new recipes, planning my next trip, and spending time with my cat, Lou!
